entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 2:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
